Projects

01

Vehicle Rental Store

Built a secure vehicle rental platform with Razorpay integration and Cloudinary for document verification, handling 500+ requests per hour.

02

Ed-Tech StudyNotion

Developed an EdTech platform for instructors to create and sell courses, featuring video lectures and feedback system. Implemented user roles with secure access, allowing students to purchase, rate, and review courses, improving engagement by 30%.

03

Book Store

Created a platform for students to upload, download, and manage books/notes, optimizing data retrieval by 50% with efficient CRUD operations.

Me and
MyTech Stack

Hello! I'm a web developer who loves crafting things for the web. My portfolio is like a collection of my creative projects where I use my technical skills to make websites shine. I focus on creating websites that are not just pretty to look at, but also work smoothly. Whether it's building the visible parts or the hidden coding, I've got it covered. I use tools like Django and the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) to bring ideas to life with smart and organized code.

Take a peek at my portfolio, and you'll find a variety of projects I've worked on. Imagine interactive websites that tell stories in a unique way – that's my jam. I make sure these websites look and work great whether you're using a computer, phone, or tablet. Every button you click and every page you visit, I make sure it's a seamless experience. If you're curious to see how I work with code using tools like Django and the MERN stack, feel free to explore my portfolio!
